title: Razo Luxis LS118A Clear Crystal Bubble Shift Knob with Multi-Color LED
features: Diamond cut design; suspended bubbles fill the interior of this brilliant cut knob - adding luxurious visual depth and style
7 color changing LEDs located at the base beautifully illuminate this luxurious knob
Fits shaft sizes: M8 x P1.25M, M10 x P1.25, or M12 x P1.25
Compatible with manual transmission or automatic gate type transmission
description: Hot dress-up item in Japan, this shift knob will definitely set your ride apart from the rest. Luxis is dedicated to bringing you the largest selection of dress-up parts. Designed and manufactured by the same company that brings you Razo. Innovative designs and made with the highest quality materials available. The ultimate luxury dress-up accessory.
